de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution.estimator

Interface MeanVarianceDistributionEstimator<D extends Distribution>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - Distribution type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistributionEstimator<D>, MOMDistributionEstimator<D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMeanVarianceEstimator, ExponentialMOMEstimator, GammaMOMEstimator, NormalMOMEstimator, WaldMOMEstimator

    public interface MeanVarianceDistributionEstimator<D extends Distribution>
extends MOMDistributionEstimator<D>
    Interface for estimators that only need mean and variance. These can implicitely (obviously) also handle full statistical moments.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      D estimateFromMeanVariance(MeanVariance mv)
      Estimate the distribution from mean and variance.
